choices: Fox or some other feel to it
1.content:
It was mid afternoon in Springfield, U.S.A., and the high school had just let out. 18 year old Bart Simpson was walking down the street on a different path than the usual one he takes home. No, today would not be normal by any means, for Bart Simpson was heading over to the home laboratory of Professor John Frink.

In his junior year of high school, Bart had taken a job as an assistant to the prof, assistant being the polite term for his position. In reality, the Simpson boy was a glorified guinea pig for experiments that most sane people wouldn't want happening within a 50 miles of their home, but Bart needed the money for a car. He wasn't Frink's ideal test subject, but no one else applied for the job, and monkeys were expensive, dammit. So the two were stuck with each other, although there were some benefits of their professional relationship. Namely, a recent experiment had given Bart a more than size increase of that which dangled between his legs.

Professor Frink was all set to go by the time the teenage prankster got there. A glass chamber sat in the middle of the testing area, surrounded by orange caution cones. Frink himself was busy at a control panel, typing in numerous calculations before he turned to Bart and gave him the day's briefing.

"Good afternoon, young Simpson. *gu'hey* Today we will be testing my new invention, with the lever pulling, and the button pushing, and the 'oh god my insides hurt from the machine!' I have created a machine that will tear open a hole to a different dimension. *m'hey* Now step in the platform and don't touch anything, while I send you to another world, or to a fiery, unbelievably painful death. *ga'hoyven*

Bart was already in the machine when Frink finished speaking.

"Wait, what was that last pa..." Bart began to ask when the Professor threw the switch.

"For SCIENCE!"

The world Bart landed in has a very...
1.title: The Fantastic Machine

choices: Bart showers, and Lois walks in on him
Bart finishes bathing and changing, and he and Lois talk
A girl in a red cap arrives
1411.content:
The abrupt relocation of his body left Bart with mild motion sickness and disorientation. As the nausea cleared up and his vision stopped swimming, the Springfieldian found himself in front of a red door that lead into a yellow and green colored house. After Bart regained his bearings, his next move was to look over himself in the hope that all of his limbs were still attached to his body. Upon inspection, Bart discovered that while he had survived the dimensional travel, his clothes had become ragged and torn from the journey.

"Well, everything's were it should be," Bart commented, "I guess it's time to meet the locals and find out where exactly I am, and hopefully get a change of clothes."

The spiky haired young man followed the path up to the door, and gave it three hard knocks. There was no immediate answer, but Bart could hear sounds of movement from inside, and gave another three, much louder, knocks.

"Alright, dammit! Hold on!" came the irritated reply in a woman's voice. Seconds later, the door was thrown open and a redheaded woman dressed in a green blouse and beige pants stood at the threshold. "What the hell do you want?" she asked indignantly.

Bart was taken back by the demanding tone the woman used, as well as the sexy curves that she hid beneath her tight top and pants. His predicament soon came back to the front of his mind, and he was faced with how, exactly, he could explain without sounding like a crazy person.

As for the redhead, she, too, was momentarily speechless at the sight of the fit, well built young man with the strange yellow skin.

"Well, ma'am" Bart started, "I seem to be a little lost. Could you please tell me where I am exactly?"

"You're in Quahog," the redhead answered, "and my name's Lois Griffin."

"And where is Quahog exactly?" Bart continued.

"Rhode Island. What the hell happened to your clothes?"

Bart's mind worked quickly to come up with an excuse, luckily it was well practiced in lying.

"I kind of fell into a thorn covered bush a ways back, and it tore my clothes up, and I don't really have a back up set of clothes."

Lois looked at him with discerning eyes before she opened the door wide to allow him into the house.

"Well, come in. I can at least let you take a shower, and give you some of my husband's old clothes to wear so you don't look like a bum at least."
1411.title: Lois Griffin

choices: Hayley asks Bart to leave due to feeling too uncomfortable
1422.content:
Bart dropped from a portal above Hayley, who was on her way back from her studies at college, narrowly missing her "Oh my god, are you okay?" she said crouching down at the side of him, bart turned over and saw her, "Im fine, my arm kinda hurts though", "come with me" she said whilst helping him to his feet, she helped him over to a bench close by, "what was up with that portal, are you an alien or something", Bart realised that she was stoned and decided to take advantage of this, "yeh im an alien, I come from Rigel 7, where I lived with my brothers Kang and Kodos", "I probably shouldnt tell you this but..." she got close to his ear and whispered "we have a alien at our house, his name is Roger, perhaps you know him", "Oh yeah Roger, I used to be pals with that guy back in the day" he said realising that he had made a mistake, "Come with me and I'll take you to him" Hayley said excitedly, "Sure, wouldnt hurt to catch up after all this time" he let out a nervous laugh and followed her to her house, She went in and shouted "ROGER!", she waited a moment before shouting again "ROGER GET DOWN HERE!", "I guess he's out at the moment, come with me", she led him upstairs to her room, "Sit down wherever" she said whilst jumping onto the bed, Bart sat down on a bean bag,"sorry, I forgot to ask, whats your name?" she embarringly enquired, "Im Bart", "well Bart I'm Hayley, nice to meet you" "So Bart tell me about your home planet", "umm..." Regret spread throughout Barts mind,"I'm already in this deep, I might aswell just play along" he thought to himself, "On my planet we greet each other by smelling the others feet" he said, trying to indulge his foot fetish whilst he could, he had noticed her feet and sandals earlier but was too shook up from his fall to pay attention. "Really?" Hayley said hesitantly, "yeah, it allows you to tell how the other is feeling and tells them about yourself" Bart followed , "how come Roger has never mentioned this then?", "Between me and you, Roger has a bit of a foot fetish, and hes pretty awkward about it", "Oh" Hayley said with a suprised tone, "Well how about you try it out on me then?" She said whilst sitting up straight and placing her sandaled feet down, Bart took this opportunity to admire her feet, her toes were painted a light blue and had lightly chipped, her toes were chunky and were presented nicely in her beaten up sandals, Bart grabbed her sandal and placed it to his nose, the smell hit him like a truck, it was a overpowering stench of sweat and leather, "Erm, what are you doing?" Hayley said with a stern tone, "sorry, I got carried away", Hayley started to feel uncomfortable and wondered what she had gotten into, but before she could stop him Bart had grabbed her foot and placed it on his face, he rubbed her suprisingly soft and silky sole over his face before placing it back down and saying "well, after that I would say your nervous and slightly excited", "You're right...." she said shocked, having expected him to be lying.

What happens next?
1422.title: Hayley

choices: Bart Chickens out for fear of being caught
14221.content:
The sound of a door slamming spread throughout the house, Hayley quickly grabbed her sandal and placed it back on her foot, she grabbed your wrist and took you downstairs, you came down to see a alien in a wig and outfit, possibly trying to resemble a celebrity, "Hey Roger, ive got a suprise for you" Hayley said with a excited tone, "what is it" Roger replied, "I met someone from your home planet, he just fell out of the sky" Hayley beconned you to come over " Roger meet Bart, he says he used to be a friend of yours", "Heyyyy Roger" Bart nervously said, he was extremely scared as he could be found out at any moment now, "Hey Bart, long time no see" Roger responded, "Hayley if you dont mind me and Bart have some catching up to do so if we could have some privacy I would be so grateful", "okay Roger" she said before going back upstairs. "I know your game Bart" Roger said, "Pretend to be a alien so you can score with someone, not the most original but it works. What have you told her so far and what do you want me to do" Roger spoke of it like it was a part of daily life, Bart explained the situation to Roger, " Nice, I did the exact same thing in 2005 with Angelina Jolie, I'll tell her some bullcrap about traditions and stuff to butter her up and thats when you come in and do the do", Bart stood there in disbelief, he hadnt expected this to happen it was all too easy surely there had to be a catch, "Erm, Roger do I have to do anything in return?" Bart said expecting a gigantic list of jobs or items, but Roger replied with "Go get me a decent bottle of wine and we'll call it even". Bart rushed down to the nearest store and grabbed the most expensive bottle he could find, he returned to find Roger in the living room, "Shes all yours" he said, Bart passed him the wine and ran up the stairs.

What happens next
14221.title: Roger comes home

1431.content:
Bart wakes up from what could be a major headache after being pulled into another dimension by the machine. Speaking of which, he noticed that he's outside with his clothes ripped up by the travel here. Wherever "here" is. He then seees a African-American woman wearing a white shirt and light blue stretch pants on noticing him here.

"Oh my God! Are you okay, young man?!" The woman asked in concern for Bart's health.

"I am. Thanks, uh?" Bart wonders what the woman's name is.

"Oh! I'm Donna Tubbs. What's your name?" Donna asked.

"Bart Simpson. Where exactly am I?" Bart wondered.

"You're in Stoolbend, Virginia. Oh! Your clothes are all ripped up. Come home with me and I'll get you something fresh and clean to put on." Donna said.

She drives Bart to her home and gives him some new clothes to cover himself. She even goes to make some lunch for him for she figured that he might be hungry. After eating, Donna cleans the dishes and Bart can't help but give a quick stare at her. She has a nice figure with her breasts not too big, but her ass is a little bit. He shook it out of his head and goes to the living room to see what's on T.V.. He gotta admit, it's not so bad in this universe. He goes through the T.V. channels and Donna comes in. She was on the phone woth someone and wasn't paying attention as she sits on the couch. The thing is, she's sitting on Bart and was feeling astonished. Donna
1431.title: Donna Tubbs

144.content: who finds Bart in the futurama
144.title: Futurama

info.brief_description: He is out to score with the animated world's hottest women.
info.description:
While assisting Professor John Frink with a new invention, Bart Simpson is sent into the worlds of other cartoons. While he is there, he scores with the sexy women of animated television.

Rules:
1. Bart can only have sex with women.
2. No chapters shorter than a paragraph.
3. The women can cross over into the real world.
4. A harem is highly encouraged.
5. Have fun.
